author: CTPPS
body:
The reconstruction proceeds in the following stesp:
- class `TotemRPClusterProducer`: merges neighbouring digis into hit clusters.
- class `TotemRPRecHitProducer`: converts clusters into RecHits, with position in mm from sensor centre.
- class `TotemRPUVPatternFinder`: searches for linear track patterns in each RP, separately in the U and V transverse projections
- class `TotemRPLocalTrackFitter`: for each RP with unique combination of U and V patterns, the module performs a track fit
title: CTPPS: TOTEM RP local reconstruction algorithms
